node.statement: GAUSSIAN SPLITTING IDENTITY (PROVED): (p boxplus G_s) boxplus (q boxplus G_t) = (p boxplus q) boxplus G_{s+t}. This follows from associativity and commutativity of boxplus together with G_s boxplus G_t = G_{s+t} (Gaussian cumulants are additive). Proved algebraically in ex7 (PROVER-13).
